during a ceremony at the plant. "The new 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town& Country remain key parts of our revival plan," Sergio Marchionne told more than 1,200 employees in the audience. We must continue to put our trust in each other and make a true, full-faith effort to work together.
